content.question: The painting on the left tells a story by

choices.label: concealing the narrative beneath hidden symbols
combining classical and Biblical textual sources
creating the scene as an otherworldly vision

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art) beyond the image set, including-  a. form.  b.  Style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
